channel.title: 2 Glitches/Errors
channel.description:
God my server's messing up today :confused:
[b]First Error/Glitch:[/b] I set the limit to 99 and used a max out code :P, but my stats stayed like this. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/4636/lserroryc2.png[/img][/URL] I tried using the maxcode again, and waiting for them to see if they'd go back to normal, but they're not. Any ideas? [b]Second Error/Glitch:[/b] When I edit the name of a weapon, it doesn't make the change in game. For example, I changed "Staff" to "Wooden_staff". I compiled, (if that did any good), but it still didn't do anything in game.

item.title: 2 Glitches/Errors
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

Land:

I did, it just says “Max XP value reached”, because it’s technically still at 99.

i might be wrong but sometimes logging out and back in helps.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Glitches/Errors
item.dc:creator: @Land Land
item.description:
@Land wrote:

God my server’s messing up today

First Error/Glitch:
I set the limit to 99 and used a max out code :P, but my stats stayed like this.

I tried using the maxcode again, and waiting for them to see if they’d go back to normal, but they’re not. Any ideas?
Second Error/Glitch:
When I edit the name of a weapon, it doesn’t make the change in game. For example, I changed “Staff” to “Wooden_staff”. I compiled, (if that did any good), but it still didn’t do anything in game.

Read full topic
